sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import "./tour-card.css" const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title, city, photo, price, featured,reviews} = tour const totalRating = reviews?.reduce((acc,item)=> acc+item.rating, 0) const avgRating = totalRating==0 ? '' : totalRating== 1 ? totalRating :totalRating / reviews?.length return
Featured
{city} {avgRating == 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating == 0 ? ( 'Not Rated' ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )}
{title}
${price} / per person
} export default TourCard
